name: scdlbot
description: Telegram Bot for downloading MP3 rips of tracks/sets from SoundCloud, Bandcamp, YouTube with tags and artwork.

STORE_CHAT_ID.description: Chat ID for storing audios for inline mode

SC_AUTH_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies

NO_CLUTTER_CHAT_IDS.description: Comma-separated chat IDs with no replying and caption hashtags

BIN_PATH.description: Custom directory with scdl and bandcamp-dl binaries are available

DL_DIR.description: Parent directory for MP3 download directory, default: ~ (user's home directory)
